alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafourche; Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 9:22AM CDT until May 06 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lafourche Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Central Jefferson Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 922 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Myrtle Grove to 6 miles east of Galliano, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cut Off, Port Sulphur, Galliano, Myrtle Grove, Lafitte, Pointe A La Hache, Empire, Barataria and Grand Isle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
